Name: WordPress
Capabilities: Supports themes, plugins, custom templates, public API
Limitations: Security vulnerabilities with plugins, updates required

Name: Squarespace
Capabilities: Drag-and-drop builder, beautiful templates, integrated e-commerce

Name: Drupal
Capabilities: Highly customizable, strong user roles and permissions
Limitations: Requires technical knowledge, more complex setup

Name: Shopify
Capabilities: E-commerce focused, easy to use, secure payment options
Limitations: Monthly fees can add up, limited customization

Name: Magento
Capabilities: Highly scalable, flexible for e-commerce solutions
